name: date-fns-example-webpack3
description: Example of date-fns usage with webpack 3.x
author: Sasha Koss <koss@nocorp.me>

scripts.build: yarn build-date-fns && yarn build-webpack && yarn stats-size
scripts.build-webpack: webpack example=./example.js minimal=./minimal.js noShaking=./noShaking.js fp=./fp.js misc=./misc.js --optimize-minimize --output-path dist --output-filename [name].js
scripts.test: yarn test-example && yarn test-minimal && yarn test-noShaking && yarn test-fp && yarn test-misc
